name: Newport Computer Services, Inc.
tag_list: computer-asset-recovery, it-assets-recycling, computer-disposal, used-computers, refurbished-computers, computer-recycling, it-asset-management, recycle-computers, asset-recovery, data-destruction, ewaste, used-computer-parts, computer-liquidation, used-c
overview: Newport Computers offers Nationwide computer asset recovery and IT assets recycling management services. We specialize in the environmentally safe and secure disposal and dispersal of e-waste, leased, used, old or obsolete computers and electronic equipment. We also offer quality tested refurbished desktop computers, laptops, printers, monitors and other used computer parts and components. Our philosophy of reuse and recycle makes us a premier source for refurbished and used computer parts online.
